ajax.desc: Uses the XmlHttpRequest technology to get a file from its URL.
examples: ajax({url: string, async: boolean, success: function, error: function, progress: function, parse: boolean})

date.desc: A unique way to manipulate time values.

scrolltop.desc: Scroll to the top of the page with one function.

cookies.desc: Allow to set and get cookies quickly and easily in Javascript !

os.desc: Get the OS of any user.

browser.desc: Detects and compares the user's web browser.

isMobile.desc: Check if the page is displayed on a mobile device.

lang.desc: Detects and compares the user language.

popup.desc: Shows a popup page on the browser.
examples: popup(url: string, title: string, height: number, width: number)

print.desc: Asks the user about print the page.

screen.desc: Gets info about the screen width and height.

title.desc: Gets or set the current title of the page.

url.desc: Sets or gets the current url to a new destination.

getScript.desc: Gets a javascript or css script from an url and execute it.

getJSON.desc: Gets a JSON file from an url and return it.

id.desc: Creates a random and unique identifier

html.desc: Fills all matched nodes with a string or a node.

append.desc: Appends a string or a node to all matched nodes.

prepend.desc: Prepends a string or a node to all matched nodes.

each.desc: Loops into all matched nodes and call a function for each.

first.desc: Returns the first node or call a function with it.

last.desc: Returns the last node or call a function with it.

parent.desc: Returns the parent node or call a function with the last node.

prop.desc: Sets or get a property for any element.

addClass.desc: Adds class to all matching nodes.

removeClass.desc: Removes class to all matching nodes.

toggleClass.desc: Toggles class to all matching nodes.

hasClass.desc: Returns "true" if the first node has the specify class

removeAttr.desc: Removes an attribute to any element.

attr.desc: Set an attribute to any element.

hide.desc: Set an attribute to any element.

show.desc: Set an attribute to any element.

after.desc: Insert a string or a node after existing node(s).

before.desc: Insert a string or a node before existing node(s).
